metadata.title: CVE-2019-9787 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: WordPress before 5.1.1 does not properly filter comment content, leading toRemote Code Execution by unauthenticated users in a default configuration.This occurs because CSRF protection is mishandled, and because SearchEngine Optimization of A elements is performed incorrectly, leading to XSS.The XSS results in administrative access, which allows arbitrary changes to.php files. This is related to wp-admin/includes/ajax-actions.php andwp-includes/comment.php.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
